strengths.detail: 7+ schema types: Organization, WebSite, OnlineStore, BreadcrumbList, Product (with AggregateRating), SiteNavigationElement, FAQPage. AI-optimization meta tags enabled.

Chicken Wrapped Pumpkin has excellent title ('Chicken Wrapped Pumpkin Dog Treats | High Protein Gut Health | CareK9'), strong meta description, full Product schema with ratings, proper OG tags with product data.
Proper canonical/hreflang tags, CDN preconnect, font-display swap, deferred JS, mobile-responsive Dawn-based theme, AI-content-policy meta tags.
Fresh-to-order, single-ingredient, human-grade positioning aligns perfectly with Reddit consumer preferences and $11.25B market trends. Anti-filler messaging resonates strongly.
Twitter/X analysis shows paw care has almost no brand marketing presence. CareK9 already has paw products â€” massive underserved niche.
Homepage FAQPage schema with 7 relevant Q&As. AI search engines (ChatGPT, Perplexity, Google AI Overviews) can directly cite this content.

issues.detail: No H1 tag on homepage â€” fundamental SEO issue. Search engines use H1 to understand page topic.
issues.recommendation: Add H1: 'Premium Natural Dog Treats & Wellness Products' or similar with primary keywords. Edit the homepage section in Shopify theme.

issues.detail: Title tag is just 'CareK9' â€” missing all target keywords. Competitors use keyword-rich titles.
issues.recommendation: Change to: 'CareK9 | Premium Natural Dog Treats, Food Toppers & Paw Care'. Keep under 55 chars.

issues.detail: Homepage meta says 'soon to come treats' but treats are already the main product line. Misleads users and search engines.
issues.recommendation: Update to: 'Premium single-ingredient dog treats made fresh to order. Human-grade chicken & pumpkin treats, functional food toppers, and natural paw care. Shop CareK9.'

issues.detail: Extremely low organic discovery. No blog content, no content marketing, no backlink strategy. Reddit shows competitors like Only One Treats and Devil Dog Pet Co drive traffic via educational blogs.
issues.recommendation: Implement content marketing: 4 cornerstone blog posts (month 1), then 2-4/month. Target 'single ingredient dog treats', 'best dog treats for sensitive stomachs', 'dog paw care guide'.

issues.detail: Blog section returns 404. Missing entire content marketing channel. Competitors with blogs rank for long-tail keywords that drive purchase decisions.
issues.recommendation: Create Shopify blog. First 4 posts: 'Complete Guide to Single Ingredient Dog Treats', 'Dog Nutrition 101', 'Ultimate Dog Paw Care Guide', 'How to Choose Dog Food Toppers'.

issues.detail: All non-homepage pages show 'Translation missing: en.general.breadcrumbs.home' in BreadcrumbList schema. Google may reject this structured data.
issues.recommendation: Add missing translation key in Shopify locales: en.general.breadcrumbs.home = 'Home'. Check locales/en.default.json.

issues.detail: Missing og:image means poor social sharing appearance on Facebook, Twitter, Slack, etc. Homepage shares look broken.
issues.recommendation: Set a default OG image (1200x630px) featuring CareK9 branding + product collage. Set in Shopify theme settings or meta-tags.liquid.

issues.detail: About-us, collections, and most product landing pages have 100% bounce rate. Only homepage (63%) and chicken treats product page retain visitors.
issues.recommendation: Add related products, internal links, compelling CTAs on every page. Implement 'You May Also Like' section. Add collection page descriptions (200-300 words each).

issues.detail: Shop All collection page has empty meta description: content=''. Google will auto-generate a snippet which may not be optimal.
issues.recommendation: Add collection description: 'Shop CareK9's complete line of premium dog treats, functional food toppers, and natural paw care products. Made fresh to order with human-grade ingredients.'

issues.detail: No GSC property set up. Cannot monitor search performance, keyword rankings, indexing issues, or structured data errors.
issues.recommendation: Create GSC property for carek9.com. Submit sitemap.xml. Monitor indexing and structured data validation.

issues.detail: Only 2 reviews on chicken treats product. Reddit research shows reviews are #9 decision factor. AggregateRating schema needs review volume.
issues.recommendation: Install Judge.me or Loox. Send post-purchase review request emails. Target 50+ reviews on hero product within 3 months. Reviews also feed AI search engines.

issues.category: Identical Alt Text on Product Images
issues.detail: All 14+ product images on chicken treats page share identical alt text (= meta description). Should describe each image uniquely.
issues.recommendation: Write unique alt text per image: 'close-up of chicken wrapped pumpkin treat', 'CareK9 treat bag front view', 'dog eating CareK9 chicken pumpkin treat', etc.

issues.detail: Image gallery on homepage displays 5 identical chicken pumpkin treat cards. Fails to showcase product range diversity.
issues.recommendation: Feature different products: chicken treats, OxiDog chips, paw balm, food topper, salmon bites. Drives cross-selling and reduces bounce.

issues.detail: Zero brand awareness on Twitter. No @CareK9 handle. Twitter research shows single-ingredient and paw care niches are wide open.
issues.recommendation: Claim @CareK9 handle. Start with 'hot take' posts on industry problems (fillers, misleading labels). Use #SingleIngredient #CleanDogTreats #DogMomLife hashtags.

issues.category: OnlineStore Schema Uses favicon as Logo
issues.detail: OnlineStore schema references /favicon.ico instead of actual brand logo. Affects how brand appears in knowledge panels.
issues.recommendation: Set settings.logo in Shopify theme settings, or fix the local-business-schema.liquid snippet to reference the correct logo URL.

issues.detail: Two URLs exist: /products/chicken-wrapped-pumpkin AND /products/chicken-wrapped-pumpkin-healthy-dog-treats. Splits link equity.
issues.recommendation: 301 redirect shorter URL to the keyword-rich canonical. Add redirect in Shopify admin > Online Store > Navigation > URL Redirects.

issues.detail: Only Facebook in sameAs schema. Missing Instagram, Twitter, TikTok. Incomplete social signals for GEO/knowledge panel.
issues.recommendation: Set up Instagram (visual pet content), TikTok (#DogTok 386M+ views), Twitter. Add all to Shopify social settings.

issues.detail: No fetchpriority='high' on hero/LCP images. No preload hints for above-fold images.
issues.recommendation: Add fetchpriority='high' to hero image. Add <link rel='preload'> for LCP image in theme.liquid.

cornerstoneArticles: The Complete Guide to Single Ingredient Dog Treats
Dog Nutrition 101: Understanding What's Really in Your Dog's Treats
The Ultimate Guide to Dog Paw Care (Seasonal Tips)
How to Choose the Best Dog Food Topper for Your Dog

longTail: single ingredient dog treats for allergies
best dog treats for sensitive stomachs
dog paw balm for cracked paws
dog treats made fresh to order

contentStrategy.publishingSchedule: 2-4 posts/month. Mix: 60% informational, 25% commercial, 15% brand story.
contentStrategy.geoStrategy: Create 'best of' comparison content, get listed in pet review sites, build entity authority via consistent NAP and structured data

competitiveGaps: No dominant single-ingredient treat brand on Twitter
Paw care products have almost no social marketing presence
Food toppers discussed by consumers not brands (opportunity to lead conversation)
Fresh-to-order positioning is unique vs freeze-dried competitors

redditSentiment.topComplaint: China-sourced ingredients (#1 concern after 2007 melamine scandal)
